评论详情: Love, love, love this top! Bought to wear at fitness classes in cold studios, but I find myself wearing it out and about almost every day. Love it so much I bought a second color, and I am considering a third since the price has dropped. The top fits true to size, washes well, and is cut in a way that allows movement. The RBX brand has become my "go to" for fitness and athleisure wear.
This came quickly and in perfect condition. Tried it on and, again, it was perfect. I love the way it fits and is very flattering as well as cozy. Beautiful color.

评论概述: Awesome top, but definitely don't buy it for the thumb holes.
评论详情: Was looking to up my game for my work at home wardrobe, and these fit the bill really nicely.  They are toasty warm, which is awesome, and the style is cute.  I don't know why they bothered with the thumb holes, though, because the sleeves are just long enough as regular sleeves.  If I try to use the thumb holes, the sleeves are stretched and it just looks silly.  I might just stitch them up altogether so there's no little slit there (although I mostly just forget they're there).  I would love for them to hang down just a couple of inches longer, but they're still really great with leggings.  I ordered them in 3 colors (purple, blue, charcoal) and love them all.  My mom even ordered some after she saw me in mine.  For sizing reference, I ordered a M (which fit me perfectly) and I'm 5'8", 138/slender build not busty.
Firms great roomier around the midline and weight but more form fitting around neck and shoulders.

I bought this to replace my 10 year old RBX French terry hoodie.  I would have liked a hood but could not find one with the cotton content I wanted.  This works very well.  The collar adds a little style.

Attractive top. Very comfy & flattering, but when I washed it there was a crazy amount of lint that came off- lint covered the other clothes washed with it. After 3 wash cycles this top is still “off-linting” What a mess!
Feels true to size for me and looks better than standard sweatshirt styles.  I like the diagonal zipper that makes it easier to adjust for temperature/comfort.  Would purchase again.
I love this sweater. I got it in black in a size small. It's thicker and warmer than expected. Fits great. Great quality, great value.
I like how it lays across your chest and waist. Even worked during 2nd trimester of my pregnancy
Seems like a quality product but too big. Would be very warm. I’m returning but may try a smaller size
Wish I would've sized up!  Fits to a tee & I haven't washed it yet! Being 60% cotton, it will shrink. I highly suggest sizing up if you plan to wash it or wear ANYTHING under it!
I like how it looks. It fits true to size it is XL.  The material is soft and it washed up well.  I have been looking at other colors.

I bought this in blue.  I am a size small (5'5" 110 lbs )and bought the small.  It fits perfectly.  Some reviews said that the length of the sleeves were too short but I have long arms and the sleeves are perfect for me.It is so stylish.  Much more so than the pictures show.  I am quite slim and most shirts like this look boxie on me but not this lovely, cozy shirt.I  bought this when it was on sale and I would buy  a couple more in different colors if they were still at that price but they are a little too expensive at regular price for me.

评论概述: Great layer for travel or running errands
评论详情: I love the color, and the style of this top. It isn't too heavy or too light. I wore the first time traveling and it was the perfect layer for the plane trip. I have worn it several times since and washed at least twice. I do hang dry nearly all my clothes, so I can't speak to shrinking. It is so comfortable and the style made me feel comfortable giving just the right coverage with joggers. I would buy this again in other colors.
My new go-to for winter. Bought 3. These items wash and dry very well. Some pilling though
To lazy to get out

I've ordered items from RBX before and ordered a small.  I've even had to had some of the small items altered under the arms for a better fit.  However, Amazon (& from other reviews) recommended I order a medium and I'm glad I did.  This sweatshirt is warm, soft and nice looking.  It's perfect for our upstate NY fall  weather season.  I'm 5'3", 115#.  I do have a larger bust, so the medium is perfect, especially for layering with a tank or t-shirt underneath.  It's a great item and I love the blue color.  I'm sure I'll order another in the near future.
Loved the weight of the fabric, nice & cozy.  Wish is was a little long, not quite long enough for a more flattering fit

评论概述: True to size and oh so soft!
评论详情: This top is so cute and comfy.  I'm 5,5" and 138 pounds and the medium fit perfect.  The sweatshirt is warm and comfy and cute.  It feels like a sweatshirt but looks very cute.  I washed this top and hung to dry and it did not shrink.  I fluffed it on air in the dryer and it comes out so soft.
Currently my favorite top to skip on and get to work. Comfortable and stylish! Good quality and versatility! Has been washed many times and hasn’t lost much color or size. Great value for the cost.

评论概述: Good quality, but check for stains
评论详情: I like the overall quality, and it’s very comfortable, but unfortunately it came with a white spot on the chest and will have to swap for another. Looks like a bleach splatter.
The suggested size was an XL, but I sized down. The cut of the sweatshirt looks better with a form fit.

评论概述: Honestly, very flattering and a bit different
评论详情: I have about 5 of these tops - we have two houses so I bought some for both places.  I love them.  They are flattering and the asymmetrical zipper neckline is really cool and elevates them from just a 1/4 zip top.  They wash well - very little if any shrinkage.  They also don't pill easily.  Love these.

评论概述: Super cute and comfy. Lightweight and warm!
评论详情: I was looking for a cute and trendy sweatshirt and this looks exactly like it does in the pictures—fitting very well. Very comfortable, soft material. It wears and washes extremely well and is lightweight. Lots of compliments on this one! Also, my husband loves the feel while cuddling/hugging 😁.

I have now ordered 4 different colors. First purchase was a large which was too big. I layer so didn’t want tight sleeves. These fit very true to size with plenty of room to layer! Last 3 colors purchased Med. Love them & wear daily to Gym, home, out! They wash nicely & I quick dry, hang to keep sizing perfect. Great product I’ve recommended to all my friends!
Love the unique design of this sweatshirt.  The only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is the color is a little drab

评论概述: Quality is lovely. Exactly as described
评论详情: Fit perfect. love the style. Easy for my 88 year old mom to put on and take off- and she is looks “snappy”  in it. Not just a plain old half zip sweatshirt. She can actually go out in it.  I bought her another style as well and a couple styles for myself.

I love this sweatshirt although not sure I'd call it a sweatshirt. It's so soft, cozy and has a modern look. Not your traditional pullover, boring sweatshirt. The criss-cross of the fabric in front makes it moveable and  helps hide my aging tummy. Ordered the plum and like the color. Sizing seems spot on. I definitely recommend!

One star because it forces me to. This is my FIRST review. I ordered two, along with these other two shirts (different brand shirts). They were all dark so I washed them together. The amount of lint from these pullover was AWFUL! Dang near ruined my washing machine, the dryer -  I had to clean lint trap twice. I separated the shirts into one dryer, and RBX pullovers in my other dryer. When I opened the dryer door lint went everywhere. Disappointing to buy something that shed so much. I will be returning. Awful products.

评论概述: Good quality,  look at size chart carefully
评论详情: Love this causal sweatshirt.  I have a few other items from this brand so I felt comfortable ordering online (plus it's so easy on Amazon!)  This is a nice thick sweatshirt. The asymmetrical look attracted me and it works.  The front is criss crossed and it's a tiny bit short on me.  I'm 5'2" 140lb and long waisted. I ordered a medium and probably could have gone with a large but kept the medium because the arm length was good.  Nice unique piece that takes a sweatshirt up a notch.

Warm and cozy. I love the style, zipper at the side and the offset overlap. But I struggle when the overlap makes me look bigger, so I chose to put some small stitches on the back side and keep the two pieces in place. I wear it a lot now. And the color is beautiful!
Very comfy, true to size, beautiful color. I love it. I have two in different colors and different sizes  .medium and large. Like them both.
Love the zipper design, I actually bought more than one color, because I love the design and is perfect for the cold at the hockey ice rink! Love it I can’t wait to buy more colors!

I'm really loving this sweatshirt.  It is super soft and warm.  The quality came out much better than I expected...to my pleasant surprise.  I may buy another one in a different color.  I'm 5'3" 128 lbs and the Medium fits me perfectly.
I have had this sweatshirt for almost 2 years now. It washes up so well and it is so flattering and I love it and it has pockets. What more could you want? This is a great purchase.

Received this sweatshirt as a Christmas gift.  Love the color and cowl zip up neck.  It is a little heavy for East Texas, but love to pull it out for those cold days running errands.  Im 5’7, 124lbs, ordered a small.
Fits great!
A good fit and very comfortable
This is my third purchase of this sweatshirt . I have 3 different colors. It fits well and great for travel.

Beautiful color (mushroom) and goes well with patterned leggings but I would have liked it better if it was more generously cut. I wear 10-12 or medium inmost tops and 2 other RBX tops fit fine- different style. Can’t wear light top under it because it bunches up.  Keeping it b/o the color. Wt loss could be in my future.
There was nothing to dislike about this item. Fabric is quality, fit is quality and the color was exact. Very flattering cut on any body.  I’m planning to order more in other colors!
Nice material but runs super small
Very attractive for a sweatshirt, love the style, get many compliments. I usually wear a medium in tops but the small is plenty roomy. I hate anything tight.

Athleta had one like this and it didn’t fit. This fits great,  washes great, sits on my stumpy neck great. I really love it. I’m 5,2 and 116 lbs. i have a longer torso with two stumps attached. it hits in all the right spots.

评论概述: Similar Style at a Better Price
评论详情: I bought a similar sweatshirt that cost more than twice as much at Athleta. This sweatshirt is very similar and the quality of the fabric is great.
Love the style, fit and fabric of this sweatshirt
My adult daughter loves the style and comfort of this top. The fabric is not bulky or scratchy. True to size.

评论概述: It is soft but otherwise unremarkable
评论详情: The first time I wore it I loved it but after the second wash it has started to loose some of its charm. The shape of it is not holding well and it is just now an ok sweatshirt. For the price, I don’t think it is a great value.

What's not to love? Warm, flattering, and stylish. The color is lovely. This has laundered well with no fading. It takes a long time to dry, but that is expected. I may purchase another for next year. We had a week of a polar vortex last winter, and my house never got warm. Fortunately, I had purchased this and was comfortable.

I washed the item this morning and the lint from the top that came off during the wash was just awful! My washing machine tub just covered in lint and just completely coated the other items it was washed with! There was nothing about it needing to be washed separately.  May just donte it. Soooo disappointed with quality of product. Never will I buy from this company again!
Have a few of these. It is warm and comfortable. Love the pockets.

评论概述: Not bad but not a huge fan.
评论详情: The material is soft and warm.  I ended up not loving the color very much and the arm pit area has some stitching that’s a little uncomfortable. I was also not super in love with how far up the neck came up, it hits my chin when I walk which was irritating. All that said, I do wear it to power walk and it keeps me super warm and on windy days I’m more thankful for the high neck. I won’t buy this one again but it wasn’t too bad. I bought my size and it fit well, medium.

I love these shirts! The fit is flattering and they are so warm! Mine did not shrink when washed in cold water and dried in the dryer. The colors are rich and the style is current.  Would recommend to anyone!

评论概述: Would give 6 stars if I could
评论详情: If you are tall, this is for you. I almost 5’11 and about 145. I ordered the small and am sooo happy I did. I normally wear a medium or sometimes large but wanted a slightly fitted look and it’s perfect, I wouldn’t mind if it were a bit smaller even. But as far as length, I am long in the torso and it hits low on my but, and that’s hard to find. The fabric is a lightweight fleece on the inside but so cozy. Just get it, you won’t be sorry

Within a week it was pilling. One elbow is now almost completely white, the dye just didn't stick well or something. It isnt a very flattering shape. Love the pockets and it keeps me warm so I kept it for wearing around the house.
Great for Saturday mornings.  Comfy.  Not cut small so don’t order up a size

I originally purchased in my true size S which is perfect with jeans. I reordered in M which is longer for leggings. Now own 6 in both sizes and assortment of colors. Washes beautifully inside out with no shrinkage. The zip neckline is best feature.

I bought three of them in different colors. It's so comfortable and keeps me warm in cold temperature, or when I walk my dog out at night. I love how it covers the neck, protecting my neck for additional warms. I sometimes sleep in it as well. Stretchy and retain the shape after several washes so far. I wish they come up with additional colors.
I’m 5’4 and 135lbs. I read a couple reviews that said it runs a little big so ordered a small and it fits great over a t-shirt. Highly recommend.
Love the long arm length. Thinner but warm. Small details keep it comfortable like a zipper cover. Pockets are nice and pretty deep.

评论概述: It's warm, and will get used
评论详情: But it's not very flattering! Square & well not so cute, but it sure is warm & will work great for before workouts when it's cold or shoveling the snow when the winter coat is too much !
Love the warmth and still look stylish. The side angle 1/4 zip give it a great unique look. I am very happy with my purchase.
Love this shirt.  Honestly where I opened it I was like, meh... But when I tried it on I loved it.  Great lines, very comfortable. Great style.  Will buy more!
Warm, soft, fits well, adjusts to my movement, lush color. I adore this top.

评论概述: Purple is not very purple, more navy
评论详情: Very comfy, soft, and warm and very good quality.  Substantial, not thin.  However I ordered the grape and it is more like a dingy navy.  Not attractive on me.  I wanted a purple.  I will return.
I like everything about this sweatshirt .  Style and fit are great. I like the option to zip all of the way up or not. I ordered two more for gifts and might order more. The price is fine.

Ok, so I don't really know if this is a sweatshirt or sweater by the design. With that being said, I love it! Its flattering in my opinion and the design is different and pretty cool. Im very warm when I wear it and I love the side zipper on the neck. At first I had decided before I got it that I better love it for the price and it did not disappoint. Ive had this for a while and I wash and wash it and I have not experienced pilling at all so I'm not really sure why other reviewers have. Mine comes out of the washer/dryer looking new every time. I will most likely get another soon.
I absolutely love this stylish pullover! I love the color, how it feels and how it fits!
Perfect fit
Item is good quality, material is soft to touch and fit is as promised.
comfortable and stylish. Love this top
Light weight, shirt feels great, fits to the tee
Very comfortable and stylish!

评论概述: This is not your regular sweatshirt. Much nicer.
评论详情: This sweatshirt can be worn going out to a casual dinner or it can be worn to my grandchildren's sport activities. Love it.
Feels really cozy and looks great with the zipper on diagonal. I love this color but others to choose from. Fits well. Roomy but not baggy. I bought my usual size.

One of the most comfortable sweatshirts I have ever worn. And very flattering. The way it is cut in the front, the pockets on the side and the thumb holes --- aah, so much to like here. I promptly bought two more in different colors. Oh, and great colors too!
Soft and cozy

Fits and made well.  Good for winter running, but could be worn out to shopping or around the house.  I’m 5’1, 107# and wear a small.  The sleeves are long to provide the thumb holes for glove replacement. Enough colors to choose from.  The only down side is that it doesn’t come in white or cream.
I like it but it runs a bit small

This top was sooo cute out of the package and fit well and was so cozy. But after I washed it once it shrank so much and the material seemed to bunch up like felt or melton wool! Granted I put it through a regular wash and dry cycle in the machine but I also don’t want gym sweatshirts I have to baby. Super disappointing considering the price.
